title: He was who we thought he was
author: VD
content_html:
Dennis Green was fired as coach of the Arizona Cardinals on Monday after he failed to turn the downtrodden franchise into a winner in three seasons on the job.

And now, to the tune of Ice-T, we sing in honor of Ron Mexico, greatest quarterback there was, is, or ever shall be, except for Donovan McNabb, whose Eagles will never survive his injury.

COACH KILLA!

I don’t know why I’m not hired as an NFL consultant. Seriously, I could do better than two-thirds of the GMs out there. As for the Falcons, I don’t think getting rid of Mora is the answer. I haven’t followed them closely enough to have a strong opinion on the matter, but he’s not the one who drafted the Greatest Quarterback in the History of the Space-Time Continuum or acquired three first-round receivers, none of whom can catch the ball.
